attributes.action: reconsider plans to put fluoride in our water supplies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fluoride is toxic to humans! Yes, a certain ammount is useful in protecting teeth, but, if people are taking care of their teeth this is not necessary! Surely the responsibility of government is to provide us with as clean and pure a water supply as is possible, and not to use it to medicate us all in the name of "the poor". Education is surely a far safer strategy - and more NHS dentists.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
